title: Nixon: a self portrait
brief_description: Originally telecast by CBS in the latter part of the 1968 presidential campaign, Mr Nixon talks informally about his boyhood and family. He discusses his motivations for running for president and his thoughts on American and presidential responsibilities in the world in the years ahead.
